name: 陳怡倩
objective: This course contains skills for conference and briefing , and English language relative to this field. The content of " conference" focuses on creating an agenda , starting and controlling a meeting, agreeing and disagreeing, asking for explanations, proposing solutions, concluding a meeting and so on. "Briefing" stresses on target-setting, audiences and occasion analysis, marketing researches and individual drills accompanied by appropriate audio-visual equipment.
